title: Abdullah II of Jordan
summary: Abdullah II bin Al-Hussein (Arabic: عبدالله الثاني بن الحسين‎, romanized: ʿAbd Allāh aṯ-ṯānī ibn al-Ḥusayn; born 30 January 1962) is King of Jordan, reigning since 7 February 1999. He is a member of the Hashemite dynasty, the royal family of Jordan since 1921, and is traditionally considered a 41st-generation direct descendant of Muhammad.
